017package org.apache.juneau.bean.jsonschema;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.StringUtils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
021import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
022
023import java.net.*;
024import java.util.*;
025
026import org.apache.juneau.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.json.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.parser.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
032
033/**
034 * Represents a top-level schema object bean in the JSON-Schema core specification.
035 *
036 * <p>
037 * This implementation follows the JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 specification.
038 *
039 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
040 * <p class='bjava'>
041 *    <jc>// Create a simple schema for a person object</jc>
042 *    JsonSchema <jv>schema</jv> = <jk>new</jk> JsonSchema()
043 *       .setIdUri(<js>"https://example.com/person.schema.json"</js>)
044 *       .setSchemaVersionUri(<js>"https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema"</js>)
045 *       .setTitle(<js>"Person"</js>)
046 *       .setDescription(<js>"A person object"</js>)
047 *       .setType(JsonType.<jsf>OBJECT</jsf>)
048 *       .addProperties(
049 *          <jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<js>"firstName"</js>, JsonType.<jsf>STRING</jsf>)
050 *             .setMinLength(1)
051 *             .setMaxLength(50),
052 *          <jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<js>"lastName"</js>, JsonType.<jsf>STRING</jsf>)
053 *             .setMinLength(1)
054 *             .setMaxLength(50),
055 *          <jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<js>"age"</js>, JsonType.<jsf>INTEGER</jsf>)
056 *             .setMinimum(0)
057 *             .setExclusiveMaximum(150)
058 *       )
059 *       .addRequired(<js>"firstName"</js>, <js>"lastName"</js>);
060 *
061 *    <jc>// Serialize to JSON Schema</jc>
062 *    String <jv>json</jv> = JsonSerializer.<jsf>DEFAULT_SORTED</jsf>.serialize(<jv>schema</jv>);
063 * </p>
064 *
065 * <p>
066 * Output:
067 * <p class='bjson'>
068 *    {
069 *       <js>"$id"</js>: <js>"https://example.com/person.schema.json"</js>,
070 *       <js>"$schema"</js>: <js>"https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema"</js>,
071 *       <js>"title"</js>: <js>"Person"</js>,
072 *       <js>"description"</js>: <js>"A person object"</js>,
073 *       <js>"type"</js>: <js>"object"</js>,
074 *       <js>"properties"</js>: {
075 *          <js>"firstName"</js>: {
076 *             <js>"type"</js>: <js>"string"</js>,
077 *             <js>"minLength"</js>: 1,
078 *             <js>"maxLength"</js>: 50
079 *          },
080 *          <js>"lastName"</js>: {
081 *             <js>"type"</js>: <js>"string"</js>,
082 *             <js>"minLength"</js>: 1,
083 *             <js>"maxLength"</js>: 50
084 *          },
085 *          <js>"age"</js>: {
086 *             <js>"type"</js>: <js>"integer"</js>,
087 *             <js>"minimum"</js>: 0,
088 *             <js>"exclusiveMaximum"</js>: 150
089 *          }
090 *       },
091 *       <js>"required"</js>: [<js>"firstName"</js>, <js>"lastName"</js>]
092 *    }
093 * </p>
094 *
095 * <h5 class='section'>Key Features:</h5>
096 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
097 *    <li><b>Draft 2020-12 Support:</b> Includes all properties from the latest JSON Schema specification
098 *    <li><b>Backward Compatibility:</b> Deprecated Draft 04 properties (like <c>id</c> and <c>definitions</c>) are still supported
099 *    <li><b>Fluent API:</b> All setter methods return <c>this</c> for method chaining
100 *    <li><b>Type Safety:</b> Uses enums and typed collections for validation
101 *    <li><b>Serialization:</b> Can be serialized to any format supported by Juneau (JSON, XML, HTML, etc.)
102 * </ul>
103 *
104 * <h5 class='section'>Common Use Cases:</h5>
105 *
106 * <p><b>1. Simple Type Constraints:</b>
107 * <p class='bjava'>
108 *    <jc>// String with length constraints</jc>
109 *    JsonSchema <jv>schema</jv> = <jk>new</jk> JsonSchema()
110 *       .setType(JsonType.<jsf>STRING</jsf>)
111 *       .setMinLength(5)
112 *       .setMaxLength(100)
113 *       .setPattern(<js>"^[A-Za-z]+$"</js>);
114 * </p>
115 *
116 * <p><b>2. Numeric Ranges:</b>
117 * <p class='bjava'>
118 *    <jc>// Number between 0 and 100 (exclusive)</jc>
119 *    JsonSchema <jv>schema</jv> = <jk>new</jk> JsonSchema()
120 *       .setType(JsonType.<jsf>NUMBER</jsf>)
121 *       .setExclusiveMinimum(0)
122 *       .setExclusiveMaximum(100)
123 *       .setMultipleOf(0.5);
124 * </p>
125 *
126 * <p><b>3. Enumerations:</b>
127 * <p class='bjava'>
128 *    <jc>// Status field with allowed values</jc>
129 *    JsonSchema <jv>schema</jv> = <jk>new</jk> JsonSchema()
130 *       .setType(JsonType.<jsf>STRING</jsf>)
131 *       .addEnum(<js>"pending"</js>, <js>"active"</js>, <js>"completed"</js>);
132 * </p>
133 *
134 * <p><b>4. Arrays:</b>
135 * <p class='bjava'>
136 *    <jc>// Array of strings with constraints</jc>
137 *    JsonSchema <jv>schema</jv> = <jk>new</jk> JsonSchema()
138 *       .setType(JsonType.<jsf>ARRAY</jsf>)
139 *       .setItems(<jk>new</jk> JsonSchema().setType(JsonType.<jsf>STRING</jsf>))
140 *       .setMinItems(1)
141 *       .setMaxItems(10)
142 *       .setUniqueItems(<jk>true</jk>);
143 * </p>
144 *
145 * <p><b>5. Conditional Schemas (Draft 07+):</b>
146 * <p class='bjava'>
147 *    <jc>// Different validation based on country</jc>
148 *    JsonSchema <jv>schema</jv> = <jk>new</jk> JsonSchema()
149 *       .setType(JsonType.<jsf>OBJECT</jsf>)
150 *       .addProperties(
151 *          <jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<js>"country"</js>, JsonType.<jsf>STRING</jsf>),
152 *          <jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<js>"postalCode"</js>, JsonType.<jsf>STRING</jsf>)
153 *       )
154 *       .setIf(<jk>new</jk> JsonSchema()
155 *          .addProperties(<jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<js>"country"</js>).setConst(<js>"USA"</js>))
156 *       )
157 *       .setThen(<jk>new</jk> JsonSchema()
158 *          .addProperties(<jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<js>"postalCode"</js>).setPattern(<js>"^[0-9]{5}$"</js>))
159 *       );
160 * </p>
161 *
162 * <p><b>6. Reusable Definitions:</b>
163 * <p class='bjava'>
164 *    <jc>// Schema with reusable components using $defs</jc>
165 *    JsonSchema <jv>schema</jv> = <jk>new</jk> JsonSchema()
166 *       .setType(JsonType.<jsf>OBJECT</jsf>)
167 *       .addDef(<js>"address"</js>, <jk>new</jk> JsonSchema()
168 *          .setType(JsonType.<jsf>OBJECT</jsf>)
169 *          .addProperties(
170 *             <jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<js>"street"</js>, JsonType.<jsf>STRING</jsf>),
171 *             <jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<js>"city"</js>, JsonType.<jsf>STRING</jsf>)
172 *          )
173 *       )
174 *       .addProperties(
175 *          <jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<js>"billingAddress"</js>)
176 *             .setRef(<js>"#/$defs/address"</js>),
177 *          <jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<js>"shippingAddress"</js>)
178 *             .setRef(<js>"#/$defs/address"</js>)
179 *       );
180 * </p>
181 *
182 * <h5 class='section'>Migration from Draft 04:</h5>
183 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
184 *    <li>Use {@link #setIdUri(Object)} instead of {@link #setId(Object)} (deprecated)
185 *    <li>Use {@link #setDefs(Map)} instead of {@link #setDefinitions(Map)} (deprecated but still works)
186 *    <li>Use {@link #setExclusiveMaximum(Number)} with a numeric value instead of a boolean flag
187 *    <li>Use {@link #setExclusiveMinimum(Number)} with a numeric value instead of a boolean flag
188 * </ul>
189 *
190 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
191 *    <li class='link'><a href="https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/json-schema-core.html">JSON Schema 2020-12 Core</a>
192 *    <li class='link'><a href="https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/json-schema-validation.html">JSON Schema 2020-12 Validation</a>
193 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanJsonSchema">juneau-bean-jsonschema</a>
194 * </ul>
195 */
196@Bean(typeName="schema")
197public class JsonSchema {
198   private String name;                                   // Property name.  Not serialized.
199   private URI idUri;                                     // Draft 2020-12: $id
200   private URI id;                                        // Draft 04: id (deprecated but kept for compatibility)
201   private URI schemaVersion;
202   private String title;
203   private String description;
204   private JsonType typeJsonType;                         // JsonType representation of type
205   private JsonTypeArray typeJsonTypeArray;               // JsonTypeArray representation of type
206   private Map<String,JsonSchema> definitions;            // Retained for backward compatibility
207   private Map<String,JsonSchema> defs;                   // Draft 2020-12: $defs
208   private Map<String,JsonSchema> properties;
209   private Map<String,JsonSchema> patternProperties;
210   private Map<String,JsonSchema> dependencies;           // Retained for backward compatibility
211   private Map<String,JsonSchema> dependentSchemas;       // Draft 2019-09+
212   private Map<String,List<String>> dependentRequired;    // Draft 2019-09+
213   private JsonSchema itemsSchema;                        // JsonSchema representation of items
214   private JsonSchemaArray itemsSchemaArray;              // JsonSchemaArray representation of items
215   private JsonSchemaArray prefixItems;                   // Draft 2020-12: replaces tuple validation
216   private Number multipleOf;
217   private Number maximum;
218   private Number exclusiveMaximum;                       // Draft 06+: changed from Boolean to Number
219   private Number minimum;
220   private Number exclusiveMinimum;                       // Draft 06+: changed from Boolean to Number
221   private Integer maxLength;
222   private Integer minLength;
223   private String pattern;
224   private Boolean additionalItemsBoolean;                // Boolean representation of additionalItems
225   private JsonSchemaArray additionalItemsSchemaArray;    // JsonSchemaArray representation of additionalItems
226   private JsonSchema unevaluatedItems;                   // Draft 2019-09+
227   private Integer maxItems;
228   private Integer minItems;
229   private Boolean uniqueItems;
230   private Integer maxProperties;
231   private Integer minProperties;
232   private List<String> required;
233   private Boolean additionalPropertiesBoolean;           // Boolean representation of additionalProperties
234   private JsonSchema additionalPropertiesSchema;         // JsonSchema representation of additionalProperties
235   private JsonSchema unevaluatedProperties;              // Draft 2019-09+
236   private List<Object> _enum;                            // NOSONAR - Intentional naming. Changed to Object to support any type
237   private Object _const;                                 // NOSONAR - Intentional naming. Draft 06+
238   private List<Object> examples;                         // Draft 06+
239   private List<JsonSchema> allOf;
240   private List<JsonSchema> anyOf;
241   private List<JsonSchema> oneOf;
242   private JsonSchema not;
243   private JsonSchema _if;                                // NOSONAR - Intentional naming. Draft 07+
244   private JsonSchema _then;                              // NOSONAR - Intentional naming. Draft 07+
245   private JsonSchema _else;                              // NOSONAR - Intentional naming. Draft 07+
246   private Boolean readOnly;                              // Draft 07+
247   private Boolean writeOnly;                             // Draft 07+
248   private String contentMediaType;                       // Draft 07+
249   private String contentEncoding;                        // Draft 07+
250   private URI ref;
251   private JsonSchemaMap schemaMap;
252   private JsonSchema master = this;
253
254   /**
255    * Default constructor.
256    */
257   public JsonSchema() { /* Empty constructor. */ }
258
259   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
260   // Bean properties
261   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
262
263   /**
264    * Bean property getter:  <property>name</property>.
265    *
266    * <p>
267    * This is an internal property used for tracking property names and is not part of the JSON Schema specification.
268    *
269    * @return The value of the <property>name</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
270    */
271   @BeanIgnore
272   public String getName() {
273      return name;
274   }
275
276   /**
277    * Bean property setter:  <property>name</property>.
278    *
279    * <p>
280    * This is an internal property used for tracking property names and is not part of the JSON Schema specification.
281    *
282    * @param name The new value for the <property>name</property> property on this bean.
283    * @return This object.
284    */
285   @BeanIgnore
286   public JsonSchema setName(String name) {
287      this.name = name;
288      return this;
289   }
290
291   /**
292    * Bean property getter:  <property>$id</property>.
293    *
294    * <p>
295    * This is the Draft 2020-12 property for schema identification.
296    *
297    * @return The value of the <property>$id</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
298    */
299   @Beanp("$id")
300   public URI getIdUri() {
301      return idUri;  // Return only idUri, not id (to avoid double serialization)
302   }
303
304   /**
305    * Bean property setter:  <property>$id</property>.
306    *
307    * <p>
308    * This is the Draft 2020-12 property for schema identification.
309    *
310    * <p>
311    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
312    * Strings must be valid URIs.
313    *
314    * <p>
315    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
316    *
317    * @param idUri The new value for the <property>$id</property> property on this bean.
318    * @return This object.
319    */
320   @Beanp("$id")
321   public JsonSchema setIdUri(Object idUri) {
322      this.idUri = toURI(idUri);
323      return this;
324   }
325
326   /**
327    * Bean property getter:  <property>id</property>.
328    *
329    * <p>
330    * <b>Deprecated:</b> Use {@link #getIdUri()} instead.
331    * This property is retained for Draft 04 backward compatibility.
332    *
333    * @return The value of the <property>id</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
334    * @deprecated Use {@link #getIdUri()} instead.
335    */
336   @Deprecated
337   public URI getId() {
338      return id != null ? id : idUri;  // Fall back to new '$id' for compatibility when reading
339   }
340
341   /**
342    * Bean property setter:  <property>id</property>.
343    *
344    * <p>
345    * <b>Deprecated:</b> Use {@link #setIdUri(Object)} instead.
346    * This property is retained for Draft 04 backward compatibility.
347    *
348    * <p>
349    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
350    * Strings must be valid URIs.
351    *
352    * <p>
353    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
354    *
355    * @param id The new value for the <property>id</property> property on this bean.
356    * @return This object.
357    * @deprecated Use {@link #setIdUri(Object)} instead.
358    */
359   @Deprecated
360   public JsonSchema setId(Object id) {
361      this.id = toURI(id);
362      return this;
363   }
364
365   /**
366    * Bean property getter:  <property>$schema</property>.
367    *
368    * @return The value of the <property>$schema</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
369    */
370   @Beanp("$schema")
371   public URI getSchemaVersionUri() {
372      return schemaVersion;
373   }
374
375   /**
376    * Bean property setter:  <property>$schema</property>.
377    *
378    * <p>
379    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
380    * Strings must be valid URIs.
381    *
382    * <p>
383    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
384    *
385    * @param schemaVersion The new value for the <property>schemaVersion</property> property on this bean.
386    * @return This object.
387    */
388   @Beanp("$schema")
389   public JsonSchema setSchemaVersionUri(Object schemaVersion) {
390      this.schemaVersion = toURI(schemaVersion);
391      return this;
392   }
393
394   /**
395    * Bean property getter:  <property>title</property>.
396    *
397    * @return The value of the <property>title</property> property, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
398    */
399   public String getTitle() {
400      return title;
401   }
402
403   /**
404    * Bean property setter:  <property>title</property>.
405    *
406    * @param title The new value for the <property>title</property> property on this bean.
407    * @return This object.
408    */
409   public JsonSchema setTitle(String title) {
410      this.title = title;
411      return this;
412   }
413
414   /**
415    * Bean property getter:  <property>description</property>.
416    *
417    * @return The value of the <property>description</property> property, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
418    */
419   public String getDescription() {
420      return description;
421   }
422
423   /**
424    * Bean property setter:  <property>description</property>.
425    *
426    * @param description The new value for the <property>description</property> property on this bean.
427    * @return This object.
428    */
429   public JsonSchema setDescription(String description) {
430      this.description = description;
431      return this;
432   }
433
434   /**
435    * Bean property getter:  <property>type</property>.
436    *
437    * @return
438    *    The value of the <property>type</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
439    *    Can be either a {@link JsonType} or {@link JsonTypeArray} depending on what value was used to set it.
440    */
441   @Swap(JsonTypeOrJsonTypeArraySwap.class)
442   public Object getType() {
443      if (typeJsonType != null)
444         return typeJsonType;
445      return typeJsonTypeArray;
446   }
447
448   /**
449    * Bean property getter:  <property>type</property>.
450    *
451    * <p>
452    * Convenience method for returning the <property>type</property> property when it is a {@link JsonType} value.
453    *
454    * @return
455    *    The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonTypeArray}.
456    */
457   @BeanIgnore
458   public JsonType getTypeAsJsonType() {
459      return typeJsonType;
460   }
461
462   /**
463    * Bean property getter:  <property>type</property>.
464    *
465    * <p>
466    * Convenience method for returning the <property>type</property> property when it is a {@link JsonTypeArray} value.
467    *
468    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonType}.
469    */
470   @BeanIgnore
471   public JsonTypeArray getTypeAsJsonTypeArray() {
472      return typeJsonTypeArray;
473   }
474
475   /**
476    * Bean property setter:  <property>type</property>.
477    *
478    * @param type
479    *    The new value for the <property>type</property> property on this bean.
480    *    This object must be of type {@link JsonType} or {@link JsonTypeArray}.
481    * @return This object.
482    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
483    */
484   public JsonSchema setType(Object type) {
485      this.typeJsonType = null;
486      this.typeJsonTypeArray = null;
487      if (type != null) {
488         if (type instanceof JsonType x)
489            this.typeJsonType = x;
490         else if (type instanceof JsonTypeArray x)
491            this.typeJsonTypeArray = x;
492         else
493            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class, "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  SimpleType, SimpleTypeArray", className(type));
494      }
495      return this;
496   }
497
498   /**
499    * Bean property appender:  <property>type</property>.
500    *
501    * @param types The list of items to append to the <property>type</property> property on this bean.
502    * @return This object.
503    */
504   public JsonSchema addTypes(JsonType...types) {
505      if (this.typeJsonTypeArray == null)
506         this.typeJsonTypeArray = new JsonTypeArray();
507      this.typeJsonTypeArray.addAll(types);
508      return this;
509   }
510
511   /**
512    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>type</property> property to the correct class type.
513    *
514    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
515    *    <li>
516    *       If parsing a JSON-array, converts to a {@link JsonTypeArray}.
517    *    <li>
518    *       If parsing a JSON-object, converts to a {@link JsonType}.
519    * </ul>
520    *
521    * <p>
522    * Serialization method is a no-op.
523    */
524   public static class JsonTypeOrJsonTypeArraySwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
525
526      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
527      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
528         return o;
529      }
530
531      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
532      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
533         var cm = (
534            o instanceof Collection
535            ? session.getClassMeta(JsonTypeArray.class)
536            : session.getClassMeta(JsonType.class)
537         );
538         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
539      }
540   }
541
542   /**
543    * Bean property getter:  <property>definitions</property>.
544    *
545    * <p>
546    * <b>Deprecated:</b> Use {@link #getDefs()} for Draft 2020-12 compliance.
547    * This property is retained for Draft 04 backward compatibility.
548    *
549    * @return
550    *    The value of the <property>definitions</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
551    */
552   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getDefinitions() {
553      return definitions != null ? definitions : defs;  // Fall back to $defs for compatibility
554   }
555
556   /**
557    * Bean property setter:  <property>definitions</property>.
558    *
559    * @param definitions The new value for the <property>definitions</property> property on this bean.
560    * @return This object.
561    */
562   public JsonSchema setDefinitions(Map<String,JsonSchema> definitions) {
563      this.definitions = definitions;
564      if (definitions != null)
565         setMasterOn(definitions.values());
566      return this;
567   }
568
569   /**
570    * Bean property appender:  <property>definitions</property>.
571    *
572    * @param name The key in the definitions map entry.
573    * @param definition The value in the definitions map entry.
574    * @return This object.
575    */
576   public JsonSchema addDefinition(String name, JsonSchema definition) {
577      if (this.definitions == null)
578         this.definitions = map();
579      this.definitions.put(name, definition);
580      setMasterOn(definition);
581      return this;
582   }
583
584   /**
585    * Bean property getter:  <property>properties</property>.
586    *
587    * @return The value of the <property>properties</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
588    */
589   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getProperties() {
590      return properties;
591   }
592
593   /**
594    * Returns the property with the specified name.
595    *
596    * <p>
597    * This is equivalent to calling <property>getProperty(name, <jk>false</jk>)</property>.
598    *
599    * @param name The property name.
600    * @return The property with the specified name, or <jk>null</jk> if no property is specified.
601    */
602   public JsonSchema getProperty(String name) {
603      return getProperty(name, false);
604   }
605
606   /**
607    * Returns the property with the specified name.
608    *
609    * <p>
610    * If <property>resolve</property> is <jk>true</jk>, the property object will automatically be  resolved by calling
611    * {@link #resolve()}.
612    * Therefore, <property>getProperty(name, <jk>true</jk>)</property> is equivalent to calling
613    * <property>getProperty(name).resolve()</property>, except it's safe from a potential
614    * <property>NullPointerException</property>.
615    *
616    * @param name The property name.
617    * @param resolve If <jk>true</jk>, calls {@link #resolve()} on object before returning.
618    * @return The property with the specified name, or <jk>null</jk> if no property is specified.
619    */
620   public JsonSchema getProperty(String name, boolean resolve) {
621      if (properties == null)
622         return null;
623      var s = properties.get(name);
624      if (s == null)
625         return null;
626      if (resolve)
627         s = s.resolve();
628      return s;
629   }
630
631   /**
632    * Bean property setter:  <property>properties</property>.
633    *
634    * @param properties The new value for the <property>properties</property> property on this bean.
635    * @return This object.
636    */
637   public JsonSchema setProperties(Map<String,JsonSchema> properties) {
638      this.properties = properties;
639      if (properties != null) {
640         properties.entrySet().forEach(x -> {
641            var value = x.getValue();
642            setMasterOn(value);
643            value.setName(x.getKey());
644         });
645      }
646      return this;
647   }
648
649   /**
650    * Bean property appender:  <property>properties</property>.
651    *
652    * <p>
653    * Properties must have their <property>name</property> property set on them when using this method.
654    *
655    * @param properties The list of items to append to the <property>properties</property> property on this bean.
656    * @return This object.
657    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If property is found without a set <property>name</property> property.
658    */
659   public JsonSchema addProperties(JsonSchema...properties) {
660      if (this.properties == null)
661         this.properties = map();
662      for (var p : properties) {
663         if (p.getName() == null)
664            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchema.class,
665               "Invalid property passed to JsonSchema.addProperties().  Property name was null.");
666         setMasterOn(p);
667         this.properties.put(p.getName(), p);
668      }
669      return this;
670   }
671
672   /**
673    * Bean property getter:  <property>patternProperties</property>.
674    *
675    * @return
676    *    The value of the <property>patternProperties</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is
677    *    not set.
678    */
679   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getPatternProperties() {
680      return patternProperties;
681   }
682
683   /**
684    * Bean property setter:  <property>patternProperties</property>.
685    *
686    * @param patternProperties The new value for the <property>patternProperties</property> property on this bean.
687    * @return This object.
688    */
689   public JsonSchema setPatternProperties(Map<String,JsonSchema> patternProperties) {
690      this.patternProperties = patternProperties;
691      if (patternProperties != null) {
692         patternProperties.entrySet().forEach(x -> {
693            var s = x.getValue();
694            setMasterOn(s);
695            s.setName(x.getKey());
696         });
697      }
698      return this;
699   }
700
701   /**
702    * Bean property appender:  <property>patternProperties</property>.
703    *
704    * <p>
705    * Properties must have their <property>name</property> property set to the pattern string when using this method.
706    *
707    * @param properties The list of items to append to the <property>patternProperties</property> property on this bean.
708    * @return This object.
709    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If property is found without a set <property>name</property> property.
710    */
711   public JsonSchema addPatternProperties(JsonSchemaProperty...properties) {
712      if (this.patternProperties == null)
713         this.patternProperties = map();
714      for (var p : properties) {
715         if (p.getName() == null)
716            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchema.class,
717               "Invalid property passed to JsonSchema.addProperties().  Property name was null.");
718         setMasterOn(p);
719         this.patternProperties.put(p.getName(), p);
720      }
721      return this;
722   }

724   /**
725    * Bean property getter:  <property>dependencies</property>.
726    *
727    * @return
728    *    The value of the <property>dependencies</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
729    */
730   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getDependencies() {
731      return dependencies;
732   }
733
734   /**
735    * Bean property setter:  <property>dependencies</property>.
736    *
737    * @param dependencies The new value for the <property>dependencies</property> property on this bean.
738    * @return This object.
739    */
740   public JsonSchema setDependencies(Map<String,JsonSchema> dependencies) {
741      this.dependencies = dependencies;
742      if (dependencies != null)
743         setMasterOn(dependencies.values());
744      return this;
745   }
746
747   /**
748    * Bean property appender:  <property>dependencies</property>.
749    *
750    * @param name The key of the entry in the dependencies map.
751    * @param dependency The value of the entry in the dependencies map.
752    * @return This object.
753    */
754   public JsonSchema addDependency(String name, JsonSchema dependency) {
755      if (this.dependencies == null)
756         this.dependencies = map();
757      this.dependencies.put(name, dependency);
758      setMasterOn(dependency);
759      return this;
760   }

762   /**
763    * Bean property getter:  <property>items</property>.
764    *
765    * @return
766    *    The value of the <property>items</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
767    *    Can be either a {@link JsonSchema} or {@link JsonSchemaArray} depending on what value was used to set it.
768    */
769   @Swap(JsonSchemaOrSchemaArraySwap.class)
770   public Object getItems() {
771      if (itemsSchema != null)
772         return itemsSchema;
773      return itemsSchemaArray;
774   }
775
776   /**
777    * Bean property getter:  <property>items</property>.
778    *
779    * <p>
780    * Convenience method for returning the <property>items</property> property when it is a {@link JsonSchema} value.
781    *
782    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
783    */
784   @BeanIgnore
785   public JsonSchema getItemsAsSchema() {
786      return itemsSchema;
787   }
788
789   /**
790    * Bean property getter:  <property>items</property>.
791    *
792    * <p>
793    * Convenience method for returning the <property>items</property> property when it is a {@link JsonSchemaArray} value.
794    *
795    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonSchema}.
796    */
797   @BeanIgnore
798   public JsonSchemaArray getItemsAsSchemaArray() {
799      return itemsSchemaArray;
800   }
801
802   /**
803    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>items</property> property to the correct class type.
804    *
805    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
806    *    <li>
807    *       If parsing a JSON-array, converts to a {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
808    *    <li>
809    *       If parsing a JSON-object, converts to a {@link JsonSchema}.
810    * </ul>
811    *
812    * <p>
813    * Serialization method is a no-op.
814    */
815   public static class JsonSchemaOrSchemaArraySwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
816
817      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
818      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
819         return o;
820      }
821
822      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
823      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
824         var cm = (
825            o instanceof Collection
826            ? session.getClassMeta(JsonSchemaArray.class)
827            : session.getClassMeta(JsonSchema.class)
828         );
829         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
830      }
831   }
832
833   /**
834    * Bean property setter:  <property>items</property>.
835    *
836    * @param
837    *    items The new value for the <property>items</property> property on this bean.
838    *    This object must be of type {@link JsonSchema} or {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
839    * @return This object.
840    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
841    */
842   public JsonSchema setItems(Object items) {
843      this.itemsSchema = null;
844      this.itemsSchemaArray = null;
845      if (items != null) {
846         if (items instanceof JsonSchema x) {
847            this.itemsSchema = x;
848            setMasterOn(this.itemsSchema);
849         } else if (items instanceof JsonSchemaArray x) {
850            this.itemsSchemaArray = x;
851            setMasterOn(this.itemsSchemaArray);
852         } else {
853            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class, "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  JsonSchema, JsonSchemaArray", className(items));
854         }
855      }
856      return this;
857   }
858
859   /**
860    * Bean property appender:  <property>items</property>.
861    *
862    * @param items The list of items to append to the <property>items</property> property on this bean.
863    * @return This object.
864    */
865   public JsonSchema addItems(JsonSchema...items) {
866      if (this.itemsSchemaArray == null)
867         this.itemsSchemaArray = new JsonSchemaArray();
868      this.itemsSchemaArray.addAll(items);
869      setMasterOn(items);
870      return this;
871   }
872

1096   /**
1097    * Bean property setter:  <property>additionalItems</property>.
1098    *
1099    * @param additionalItems
1100    *    The new value for the <property>additionalItems</property> property on this bean.
1101    *    This object must be of type {@link Boolean} or {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
1102    * @return This object.
1103    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
1104    */
1105   public JsonSchema setAdditionalItems(Object additionalItems) {
1106      this.additionalItemsBoolean = null;
1107      this.additionalItemsSchemaArray = null;
1108      if (additionalItems != null) {
1109         if (additionalItems instanceof Boolean x)
1110            this.additionalItemsBoolean = x;
1111         else if (additionalItems instanceof JsonSchemaArray x) {
1112            this.additionalItemsSchemaArray = x;
1113            setMasterOn(this.additionalItemsSchemaArray);
1114         } else {
1115            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class, "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  Boolean, JsonSchemaArray", className(additionalItems));
1116         }
1117      }
1118      return this;
1119   }

1121   /**

1124    * @param additionalItems
1125    *    The list of items to append to the <property>additionalItems</property> property on this bean.
1126    * @return This object.
1127    */
1128   public JsonSchema addAdditionalItems(JsonSchema...additionalItems) {
1129      if (this.additionalItemsSchemaArray == null)
1130         this.additionalItemsSchemaArray = new JsonSchemaArray();
1131      this.additionalItemsSchemaArray.addAll(additionalItems);
1132      setMasterOn(additionalItems);
1133      return this;
1134   }

1136   /**
1137    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>additionalItems</property> property to the correct class type.
1138    *
1139    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
1140    *    <li>
1141    *       If parsing a JSON-array, converts to a {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
1142    *    <li>
1143    *       If parsing a JSON-boolean, converts to a {@link Boolean}.
1144    * </ul>
1145    *
1146    * <p>
1147    * Serialization method is a no-op.
1148    */
1149   public static class BooleanOrSchemaArraySwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
1150
1151      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
1152      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
1153         return o;
1154      }
1155
1156      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
1157      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
1158         var cm = (
1159            o instanceof Collection
1160            ? session.getClassMeta(JsonSchemaArray.class)
1161            : session.getClassMeta(Boolean.class)
1162         );
1163         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
1164      }
1165   }

1290   /**
1291    * Bean property appender:  <property>required</property>.
1292    *
1293    * @param required The list of items to append to the <property>required</property> property on this bean.
1294    * @return This object.
1295    */
1296   public JsonSchema addRequired(List<String> required) {
1297      if (this.required == null)
1298         this.required = new LinkedList<>();
1299      required.forEach(x -> this.required.add(x));
1300      return this;
1301   }
1302
1303   /**
1304    * Bean property appender:  <property>required</property>.
1305    *
1306    * @param required The list of items to append to the <property>required</property> property on this bean.
1307    * @return This object.
1308    */
1309   public JsonSchema addRequired(String...required) {
1310      if (this.required == null)
1311         this.required = new LinkedList<>();
1312      for (var r : required)
1313         this.required.add(r);
1314      return this;
1315   }
1316
1317   /**
1318    * Bean property appender:  <property>required</property>.
1319    *
1320    * @param properties The list of items to append to the <property>required</property> property on this bean.
1321    * @return This object.
1322    */
1323   public JsonSchema addRequired(JsonSchemaProperty...properties) {
1324      if (this.required == null)
1325         this.required = new LinkedList<>();
1326      for (var p : properties)
1327         this.required.add(p.getName());
1328      return this;
1329   }
1330
1331   /**
1332    * Bean property getter:  <property>additionalProperties</property>.
1333    *
1334    * @return
1335    *    The value of the <property>additionalProperties</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it
1336    *    is not set.
1337    *    Can be either a {@link Boolean} or {@link JsonSchemaArray} depending on what value was used to set it.
1338    */
1339   @Swap(BooleanOrSchemaSwap.class)
1340   public Object getAdditionalProperties() {
1341      if (additionalPropertiesBoolean != null)
1342         return additionalItemsBoolean;
1343      return additionalPropertiesSchema;
1344   }
1345
1346   /**
1347    * Bean property getter:  <property>additionalProperties</property>.
1348    *
1349    * <p>
1350    * Convenience method for returning the <property>additionalProperties</property> property when it is a
1351    * {@link Boolean} value.
1352    *
1353    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonSchema}.
1354    */
1355   @BeanIgnore
1356   public Boolean getAdditionalPropertiesAsBoolean() {
1357      return additionalPropertiesBoolean;
1358   }
1359
1360   /**
1361    * Bean property getter:  <property>additionalProperties</property>.
1362    *
1363    * <p>
1364    * Convenience method for returning the <property>additionalProperties</property> property when it is a
1365    * {@link JsonSchema} value.
1366    *
1367    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link Boolean}.
1368    */
1369   @BeanIgnore
1370   public JsonSchema getAdditionalPropertiesAsSchema() {
1371      return additionalPropertiesSchema;
1372   }
1373
1374   /**
1375    * Bean property setter:  <property>additionalProperties</property>.
1376    *
1377    * @param additionalProperties
1378    *    The new value for the <property>additionalProperties</property> property on this bean.
1379    *    This object must be of type {@link Boolean} or {@link JsonSchema}.
1380    * @return This object.
1381    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
1382    */
1383   @Beanp(dictionary={JsonSchema.class})
1384   public JsonSchema setAdditionalProperties(Object additionalProperties) {
1385      this.additionalPropertiesBoolean = null;
1386      this.additionalPropertiesSchema = null;
1387      if (additionalProperties != null) {
1388         if (additionalProperties instanceof Boolean x)
1389            this.additionalPropertiesBoolean = x;
1390         else if (additionalProperties instanceof JsonSchema x) {
1391            this.additionalPropertiesSchema = x;
1392            setMasterOn(this.additionalPropertiesSchema);
1393         } else
1394            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class,
1395               "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  Boolean, JsonSchema",
1396               className(additionalProperties));
1397      }
1398      return this;
1399   }
1400
1401   /**
1402    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>additionalProperties</property> property to the correct class type.
1403    *
1404    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
1405    *    <li>
1406    *       If parsing a JSON-object, converts to a {@link JsonSchema}.
1407    *    <li>
1408    *       If parsing a JSON-boolean, converts to a {@link Boolean}.
1409    * </ul>
1410    *
1411    * <p>
1412    * Serialization method is a no-op.
1413    */
1414   public static class BooleanOrSchemaSwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
1415
1416      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
1417      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
1418         return o;
1419      }
1420
1421      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
1422      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
1423         var cm = (
1424            o instanceof Boolean
1425            ? session.getClassMeta(Boolean.class)
1426            : session.getClassMeta(JsonSchema.class)
1427         );
1428         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
1429      }
1430   }

1853    * This is the Draft 2020-12 replacement for <property>definitions</property>.
1854    * Both properties are supported for backward compatibility.
1855    *

1857    */
1858   @Beanp("$defs")
1859   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getDefs() {
1860      return defs;  // Return only defs, not definitions (to avoid double serialization)
1861   }
1862
1863   /**
1864    * Bean property setter:  <property>$defs</property>.
1865    *
1866    * <p>
1867    * This is the Draft 2020-12 replacement for <property>definitions</property>.
1868    * Both properties are supported for backward compatibility.
1869    *
1870    * @param defs The new value for the <property>$defs</property> property on this bean.
1871    * @return This object.
1872    */
1873   @Beanp("$defs")
1874   public JsonSchema setDefs(Map<String,JsonSchema> defs) {
1875      this.defs = defs;
1876      if (defs != null)
1877         setMasterOn(defs.values());
1878      return this;
1879   }
1880
1881   /**
1882    * Bean property appender:  <property>$defs</property>.
1883    *
1884    * @param name The key in the defs map entry.
1885    * @param def The value in the defs map entry.
1886    * @return This object.
1887    */
1888   public JsonSchema addDef(String name, JsonSchema def) {
1889      if (this.defs == null)
1890         this.defs = map();
1891      this.defs.put(name, def);
1892      setMasterOn(def);
1893      return this;
1894   }

2006    * <p>
2007    * This property was added in Draft 2019-09 as a replacement for the schema form of <property>dependencies</property>.
2008    *
2009    * @param dependentSchemas The new value for the <property>dependentSchemas</property> property on this bean.
2010    * @return This object.
2011    */
2012   public JsonSchema setDependentSchemas(Map<String,JsonSchema> dependentSchemas) {
2013      this.dependentSchemas = dependentSchemas;
2014      if (dependentSchemas != null)
2015         setMasterOn(dependentSchemas.values());
2016      return this;
2017   }
2018
2019   /**
2020    * Bean property appender:  <property>dependentSchemas</property>.
2021    *
2022    * @param name The key of the entry in the dependentSchemas map.
2023    * @param schema The value of the entry in the dependentSchemas map.
2024    * @return This object.
2025    */
2026   public JsonSchema addDependentSchema(String name, JsonSchema schema) {
2027      if (this.dependentSchemas == null)
2028         this.dependentSchemas = map();
2029      this.dependentSchemas.put(name, schema);
2030      setMasterOn(schema);
2031      return this;
2032   }

2085    * Bean property setter:  <property>$ref</property>.
2086    *
2087    * <p>
2088    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
2089    * Strings must be valid URIs.
2090    *
2091    * <p>
2092    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
2093    *
2094    * @param ref The new value for the <property>$ref</property> property on this bean.
2095    * @return This object.

2097   @Beanp("$ref")

2099      this.ref = toURI(ref);

2102
2103   private void setMasterOn(JsonSchema s) {
2104      if (s != null)
2105         s.setMaster(this);
2106   }
2107
2108   private void setMasterOn(JsonSchema[] ss) {
2109      if (ss != null)
2110         for (var s : ss)
2111            setMasterOn(s);
2112   }
2113
2114   private void setMasterOn(Collection<JsonSchema> ss) {
2115      if (ss != null)
2116         ss.forEach(this::setMasterOn);
2117   }
2118
2119   private void setMasterOn(JsonSchemaArray ss) {
2120      if (ss != null)
2121         ss.forEach(this::setMasterOn);
2122   }
2123
2124   /**
2125    * Sets the master schema for this schema and all child schema objects.
2126    *
2127    * <p>
2128    * All child elements in a schema should point to a single "master" schema in order to locate registered JsonSchemaMap
2129    * objects for resolving external schemas.
2130    *
2131    * @param master The master schema to associate on this and all children.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
2132    */
2133   protected void setMaster(JsonSchema master) {
2134      this.master = master;
2135      if (definitions != null)
2136         definitions.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2137      if (defs != null)
2138         defs.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2139      if (properties != null)
2140         properties.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2141      if (patternProperties != null)
2142         patternProperties.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2143      if (dependencies != null)
2144         dependencies.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2145      if (dependentSchemas != null)
2146         dependentSchemas.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2147      if (itemsSchema != null)
2148         itemsSchema.setMaster(master);
2149      if (itemsSchemaArray != null)
2150         itemsSchemaArray.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2151      if (prefixItems != null)
2152         prefixItems.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2153      if (additionalItemsSchemaArray != null)
2154         additionalItemsSchemaArray.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2155      if (unevaluatedItems != null)
2156         unevaluatedItems.setMaster(master);
2157      if (additionalPropertiesSchema != null)
2158         additionalPropertiesSchema.setMaster(master);
2159      if (unevaluatedProperties != null)
2160         unevaluatedProperties.setMaster(master);
2161      if (allOf != null)
2162         allOf.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2163      if (anyOf != null)
2164         anyOf.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2165      if (oneOf != null)
2166         oneOf.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
2167      if (not != null)
2168         not.setMaster(master);
2169      if (_if != null)
2170         _if.setMaster(master);
2171      if (_then != null)
2172         _then.setMaster(master);
2173      if (_else != null)
2174         _else.setMaster(master);
2175   }
2176
2177   /**
2178    * Resolve schema if reference.
2179    *
2180    * <p>
2181    * If this schema is a reference to another schema (has its <property>$ref</property> property set), this
2182    * method will retrieve the referenced schema from the schema map registered with this schema.
2183    *
2184    * <p>
2185    * If this schema is not a reference, or no schema map is registered with this schema, this method is a no-op and
2186    * simply returns this object.
2187    *
2188    * @return The referenced schema, or <jk>null</jk>.
2189    */
2190   public JsonSchema resolve() {
2191      if (ref == null || master.schemaMap == null)
2192         return this;
2193      return master.schemaMap.get(ref);
2194   }
2195
2196   /**
2197    * Associates a schema map with this schema for resolving other schemas identified through <property>$ref</property>
2198    * properties.
2199    *
2200    * @param schemaMap The schema map to associate with this schema.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
2201    * @return This object.
2202    */
2203   @BeanIgnore
2204   public JsonSchema setSchemaMap(JsonSchemaMap schemaMap) {
2205      this.schemaMap = schemaMap;
2206      return this;
2207   }
2208
2209   @Override /* Object */
2210   public String toString() {
2211      return JsonSerializer.DEFAULT_SORTED.toString(this);
2212   }
